text: Horst Aisslinger (2 April 1925 – 25 February 1992)Background notes on The Roll of Distinguished Philatelists September 2011, Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Trust, London, 2011. Archived here. was a German philatelist who was added to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1981. ==References== Category:Signatories to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Category:1925 births Category:1992 deaths Category:German philatelists
title: Horst Aisslinger
